knimeNode.name: Date/Time Shift
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds a value as defined in a numerical column in a defined granularity to an existing date.

fullDescription.intro:
This node adds the value of a numerical column to an existing date. This value can represent different aspects of the date, as defined by its aggregation level (year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, minute).
There are different possibilities for selecting a date. The first possibility is the execution time, which will produce a different result in each run. The second one, is a date and time column. It is also possible to enter a fixed date in the dialog or to use the 1.1.1970, which is the default zero in Unix applications.
